A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Dumb movies are pretty commonplace these days but this one has to be the dumbest film ive see all year\, possibly of all time. 
The insulting part is that the studio expects people to lap it up and arguably many are doing exactly that. 
Ive seen reviews stating it takes star wars in a new direction but I really fail to see what that direction was and where it leaves the 3rd movie in the trilogy. 

Secondly the film is intentionally divisive with political undertones forcibly pushed upon audience\, much like the humour. 
These aspects prevent immersion and make the movie that much more of an eye roller to me. 

Such a shame for a trilogy with unlimited potential for both old fans and new fans alike.
